Text:
You gotta love the moxy of a movie studio willing to put out "American Battleship" direct to DVD, four days after "Battleship" hit theatres!

They are also the "brains" behind such other 'mockbusters' as "Titanic 2" and "The Terminators"

http://www.imdb.com/company/co0043571/

GREAT QUALITY UPLOAD, THANK YOU!
V=9, A=9
Entertaining, not too bad, reminds me of a SyFy movie.
